translations: v.用石板（或砖）铺（路）；为……铺平道路，创造条件（pave the way for sth./sb.）
【名】 （法、塞尔维亚、克罗地亚）帕韦（人名）

phrs.translation: 为…做好准备；为…铺平道路

sentences.sentence: I believe this treaty will pave the way to peace in Europe.
sentences.translation: 我相信这个条约将为欧洲的和平铺平道路。

sentences.sentence: In India, they mix thrown-out plastic waste with asphalt and use it to pave new roadways.
sentences.translation: 在印度，他们把丢弃的塑料废品和沥青混合起来，用来铺设新的道路。

sentences.sentence: Last week, France announced that the country will pave 621 miles of road with solar panels over the next five years, with the goal of providing cheap, renewable energy to five million people.
sentences.translation: 上周，法国宣布将在未来5年内铺设一条长达621英里的太阳能公路，以期为500万民众提供便宜的可再生的能源。
